Package nl.kw.processing.mirror

Class Mirror

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.kw.processing.mirror.Mirror
  • public class Mirror
extends java.lang.Object
    A Processing utility to draw the mirror image (mirage) of a PGraphics object onto that object. A mirror can be constructed with an angle, position, tint, etc. and then later used to draw the mirage of an object. The position is always set relative to the center of the image.

    The mirage can be drawn as a PImage, or pixel by pixel in a x,y loop, or by iterating the pixels[] array of the source.

    It is often useful to keep a copy of the original image elsewhere, because drawing the mirage will obviously change the image. Also, it often useful to draw the mirage on a separate PGraphics object (instead of the sketch canvas), so you can crop the result to not contain parts of the mirrored image that have no original image data.
